summary: This bill, the Public Lands Military Readiness Act of 2025, proposes to extend military land withdrawals in Alaska, New Mexico, and California for 25 years. It amends existing legislation (the Military Lands Withdrawal Act of 1999 and the Fort Irwin Military Land Withdrawal Act of 2001) to reflect these extensions and incorporates technical corrections to land descriptions for the McGregor Range and Fort Irwin military lands.
